doc:
John Loder (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Loder_(actor) 0 John Loder (born William John Muir Lowe; 3 January 1898 – 26 December 1988) was a British actor who later became an American citizen (1947). John_Loder ( born William_John_Muir_Lowe ; 3_January_1898 – 26_December_1988 ) was a_British_actor who later became an_American_citizen ( 1947 ) .
